metadata.synopsis:
(Note 1: this scene can play out from the perspective of Shadowheart, Lae'zel or a third avatar.
(Note 2: this scene features a time transition of a couple of hours. The first part takes place at camp in the evening before everyone retires. The second part occurs later the same night after everyone seemingly is asleep).(Note 3: for much of this scene after the time transition, either Shadowheart or Lae'zel is lying on the ground, being held at knife point by the other) A conflict between Shadowheart and Lae'zel comes to a head when Lae'zel learns Shadowheart has a gith artefact, She demands an explanation, but almost certainly doesn't receive one. Later, during the night, one of the two is awoken by the other, who holds them at knifepoint (this could be Shadowheart seeking to get rid of Lae'zel or Lae'zel demanding answers from Shadowheart). Things could turn violent, with one possibly killing the other and other party members possibly getting involved. Or they could bury the hatchet.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Loadlevel Wld_Main_A- Add SH and LZ through debug book (as companions/avatars as needed)- Recon: oe qnight NIGHT_ShadowHeart_LaezelFight_a3445b22-7973-416b-b8a3-1856414589ea- Go to camp- Click on campfire

3.speaker: Lae'zel
3.text: You carry a githyanki relic. I will have an explanation - or your head.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: DIR: The player walk into the scene. LZ and SH don't get along, but things seem to be turning violent. Lae'zel and SH both standingNodeContext: Lae'zel and Shadowheart are having an argument. Both are standing.

68.text: Walk away. Now. I won't warn you again.
68.context: NodeContext: Standing her gound, SH looks LZ up and down, ready for a fight.

144.speaker: Shadowheart
144.text: Walk away. Now. I won't warn you again.
144.context: NodeContext: Standing her gound, SH looks LZ up and down, ready for a fight.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Relic? This is about that artefact, isn't it?
43.context: NodeContext: DIR: What SH has done is sacrilege to LZ.

220.speaker: Lae'zel
220.text: That artefact is an heirloom of my people. Likely she spilled githyanki blood in order to steal it. This cannot stand.

61.speaker: Shadowheart
61.text: Heirloom? Plunder from some conquered realm, more like. This artefact is the only thing keeping us from becoming slaves to our parasites. Be glad I have it.

161.speaker: Player
161.text: What's going on? Why're you two arguing?
161.context: NodeContext: DIR: What SH has done is sacrilege to LZ.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: She carries an heirloom of our people. She must explain herself.
1.context: NodeContext: DIR: What SH has done is sacrilege to LZ.

22.speaker: Shadowheart
22.text: She is deluded - as are you, should you show her your allegiance.
22.context: NodeContext: Addressing the player in reference to Lae'zel's behaviour.

238.speaker: Lae'zel
238.context: NodeContext: DIR: Cold, shutting down her emotions as she's readies for a fight.

239.speaker: Shadowheart
239.text: Lae'zel thinks I have something important to her people. She's deluded, clearly.
239.context:
NodeContext: Addressing the player in reference to Lae'zel's behaviour.
DIR: Try a take where SH spits out the clearly under her breath as an after thought

141.speaker: Lae'zel
141.text: Lies. She carries an heirloom of my people. I must know why.

231.speaker: Player
231.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel addresses a fellow Gith, assuming they will also be interested in Shadowheart' supposed transgression.

121.speaker: Lae'zel
121.text: This matter concerns both of us, kin. Shadowheart has deceived us.
121.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel addresses a fellow Gith, assuming they will also be interested in Shadowheart' supposed transgression.

173.speaker: Shadowheart
173.text: Nonsense. You're just finally showing us what you really are - a reaver to the bone.
173.context: NodeContext: SH addresses Lae'zel, while implicitly trying to rally support from the player observing this argument.

98.speaker: Lae'zel
98.text: Spare your indignity. Every word that spills from your mouth is worth less than the last.

It's now later in the night, after everyone has (seemingly) gone to sleepNodeContext: Cinematics indicate that a period of time has passed. 247.text: Incorrect. Judicious bloodletting settles feuds and roots out the weak - the deceitful.

86.text: Do you hear this tripe? Our lives are at stake, and she wants us to turn on each other.

235.text: You hear that, Lae'zel? It's called common sense.

178.text: It's too late - you can't appease them. We have to do what's right for us. The artefact stays with me.

This will be followed by a separate dialogue where another Absolute vision occurs, followed by a daisy intervention.NodeContext: 'So be it' - she'll try kill both the player and Lae'zel. Both Lae'zel and Shadowheart are now on their feet, braced to fight.

65.speaker: Lae'zel
65.text: May your death be slow, and your agony great!
65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Combat is about to break out. Shadowheart and the player versus Lae'zel.InternalNodeContext: Combat ensues. This will be followed by a separate dialogue where another Absolute vision occurs, followed by a daisy intervention.NodeContext: Aggressive - turning on both the player and Shadowheart. Both Lae'zel and Shadowheart are now on their feet, braced to fight.

277.speaker: Player
277.text: Your petty quarrels disturbed my rest. Stop at once, or I will make you stop.
277.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel attacks while Shadowheart is distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.NodeContext: Grim resolve. She attacks Shadowheart, who is momentarily distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.

139.speaker: Player
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel attacks while Shadowheart is distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.NodeContext: Grim resolve. She attacks Shadowheart, who is momentarily distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.

195.speaker: Shadowheart
195.text: You too? Shar take you both, then!
195.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel attacks while Shadowheart is distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.NodeContext: Grim resolve. She attacks Shadowheart, who is momentarily distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.

275.speaker: Lae'zel
275.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel attacks while Shadowheart is distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.NodeContext: Grim resolve. She attacks Shadowheart, who is momentarily distracted. Then she manages to get to her feet to properly defend herself.

176.speaker: Player
176.text: Rest - both of you. Tempers will be cooler in the morning.

127.speaker: Shadowheart
127.text: I doubt this one's wits will be any sharper by then.

35.speaker: Lae'zel
35.text: I do not wish to spill blood here. Come daylight, we will find a place to end this.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: Fine. You can accept you're wrong, or we'll be rid of you permanently. Either way, I win.

225.speaker: Lae'zel
225.text: Remove yourself, if you are so easily offended. This is not your concern.
225.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel speaking to the player (stay out of it - this is between me and SH)

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: You have something precious to my kin - an heirloom. I will have it back.

119.speaker: Player
119.text: Leave them to settle their differences and go to sleep.

94.speaker: Shadowheart
94.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel and SH both standingNodeContext: Lae'zel approaches Shadowheart - she's got questions. Both are standing.

103.text: *Shadowheart keeps one hand on something hidden beneath her clothing.*
103.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *Shadowheart keeps one hand on something hidden beneath her clothing.*
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

107.speaker: Shadowheart
107.text: I don't know what qualifies as manners with your kind, but in Faerûn it's rude to stare.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

128.speaker: Lae'zel
128.text: What exactly were you doing before the ghaik seized you?
128.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

25.speaker: Shadowheart
25.text: Now why would you ask me a question like that?
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

191.speaker: Lae'zel
191.text: I am merely curious about my travelling companion.
191.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

106.speaker: Shadowheart
106.text: Lae'zel. You're not really the type for idle chatter. Don't develop the habit now.
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

152.speaker: Lae'zel
152.text: I know you have something precious to my kin. Explain yourself.
152.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

133.speaker: Shadowheart
133.text: I don't know what you're talking about. I suspect you don't know what you're talking about.
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

257.speaker: Lae'zel
257.text: I will have an explanation from you, or I will have your head.
257.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

27.speaker: Shadowheart
27.text: Fine. It's a lucky keepsake, nothing more. I found it in a flea market.
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

262.speaker: Shadowheart
262.text: Fine. It's a lucky keepsake, nothing more. I found it in a flea market.
262.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

268.speaker: Lae'zel
268.text: If that is true, you will have no qualms with showing it to me.
268.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

54.speaker: Shadowheart
54.text: Another time, I'm terribly tired. You should get some rest, Lae'zel.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

146.text: Sssh... don't call out. Don't move.
146.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

15.speaker: Lae'zel
15.text: Sssh... don't call out. Don't move.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Lae'zel awakening to find Shadowheart perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

165.speaker: Shadowheart
165.text: Sssh... don't call out. Don't move.
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is in control, speaking in a threatening whisper. Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.

101.speaker: Shadowheart
101.text: I needn't have woken you at all. I could've just buried this dagger in your throat.
101.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.NodeContext: Shadowheart is in control, speaking in a threatening whisper. Lae'zel is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Shadowheart, who is crouched over her.

155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kicks out from underneath Shadowheart and pull her weapon out.

279.speaker: Shadowheart
279.text: I don't care what you believe, Lae'zel. Go to sleep.

237.speaker: Lae'zel
237.text: Let the matter drop for now.

196.text: You're welcome to try. Otherwise, back off.

140.speaker: Shadowheart
140.text: You're welcome to try. Otherwise, back off.

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: Use the parasite. Probe her thoughts.

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: *You sense her fear - that you will try to take the heirloom.*

265.speaker: Narrator
265.text: *You sense her fear - that you will try to take the heirloom.*

232.speaker: Lae'zel
232.text: If you explain yourself, perhaps I will allow you to keep the heirloom.

125.text: Agh... I felt that. Get away from me, gith!

236.speaker: Shadowheart
236.text: Agh... I felt that. Get away from me, gith!

188.speaker: Lae'zel
188.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel and SH both standingNodeContext: Lae'zel approaches Shadowheart - she's got questions. Both are standing.

212.text: The artefact you possess contains someone important - someone I may need to free.

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.text: The artefact you possess contains someone important - someone I may need to free.

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: The artefact you possess contains someone important - someone my queen demands to be slain.

50.speaker: Lae'zel
50.text: Tell me what you are doing with it.

273.speaker: Shadowheart
273.text: It's my prize. I'll die to protect it.
273.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

228.speaker: Lae'zel
228.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

226.speaker: Shadowheart
226.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

249.speaker: Lae'zel
249.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one Voss wants me to free should live inside it.
249.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

202.speaker: Lae'zel
202.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one I'm to kill should be living inside it.
202.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

138.speaker: Lae'zel
138.text: Simply vexed. Anger would be impractical.

251.speaker: Lae'zel
251.text: The artefact is closed to me. But its protection is an advantage - as is having a skilful cleric at my side.

171.speaker: Lae'zel
171.text: But I will attend to the Prism's occupant, in time. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

270.speaker: Lae'zel
270.text: But make no mistake - I will slay the Prism's occupant, as Vlaakith's commanded. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

93.speaker: Lae'zel
93.text: It is for other gith to hunt and punish you. And they will, knowing my kin.

28.speaker: Lae'zel
28.text: But it is not my mission to collect your head. The ghaik parasites come first.

69.speaker: Lae'zel
69.text: I am content. Go, rest. Dawn breaks all too soon.

118.speaker: Shadowheart
118.text: Tuck the relic away and turn to leave.

99.speaker: Lae'zel
99.text: In time, I will free the occupant of that artefact. You'd be foolish indeed to intervene.

42.speaker: Lae'zel
42.text: In time, I will slay the occupant of that artefact. You'd be foolish indeed to intervene.

271.speaker: Lae'zel
271.text: Your contraband does not concern me, but it may concern my kin. Assume you are being hunted.

254.speaker: Lae'zel
254.text: Hm. A creation of my people, though I cannot decipher writing this ancient.
254.context: NodeContext: Considering a gith artefact being held in her view.

116.speaker: Lae'zel
116.text: Keep it. Do what you will with it.

241.speaker: Shadowheart
241.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Shadowheart awakening to find Lae'zel perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

175.speaker: Lae'zel
175.text: Unfortunate. I thought you may have some honour.
175.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Shadowheart awakening to find Lae'zel perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

51.speaker: Lae'zel
51.text: Go, rest. But do not consider this matter settled.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Shadowheart awakening to find Lae'zel perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

78.text: Sssh... do not move. Do not cry out. Or I will open your neck.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Shadowheart awakening to find Lae'zel perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

71.speaker: Shadowheart
71.text: Sssh... do not move. Do not cry out. Or I will open your neck.
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: The party goes to rest. Transition to Shadowheart awakening to find Lae'zel perched over/on top of her, holding a dagger on her.

278.speaker: Lae'zel
278.text: Sssh... do not move. Do not cry out. Or I will open your neck.
278.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel is in control, speaking in a threatening whisper. Shadowheart is lying down, being held at knifepoint by Lae'zel, who is crouched over her.

104.text: You have lied about the heirloom. I will have the truth, or I will have your life.
104.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart kicks out from underneath Laezel and pull her weapon out.

214.text: You have lied about the heirloom. I will have the truth, or I will have your life.
214.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

269.speaker: Lae'zel
269.text: You have lied about the heirloom. I will have the truth, or I will have your life.
269.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

72.speaker: Shadowheart
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.text: A sorry tale. Barely worth interrogating you over. Show me the heirloom.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

164.speaker: Shadowheart
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

222.speaker: Lae'zel
222.text: No matter. I can examine it for myself. Be still and this will be quick.

194.speaker: Shadowheart
194.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

244.speaker: Lae'zel
244.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one Voss wants me to free should live inside it.
244.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

157.speaker: Lae'zel
157.text: A relic of my people. An ancient one. Curious, that the one I'm to kill should be living inside it.
157.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.

136.speaker: Lae'zel
136.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart puts puzzle box away.

211.speaker: Lae'zel
211.text: Hm. A creation of my people, though I cannot decipher writing this ancient.
211.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls out the puzzle box.NodeContext: Curious, but not breathtaken.

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: Keep it. Do what you will with it.
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart puts puzzle box away.

158.speaker: Shadowheart
158.text: Wait. You held a blade to my throat over this, and now you don't care?
158.context: NodeContext: 'You'll get what's coming to you. Rest assured'.

34.speaker: Shadowheart
34.context: NodeContext: 'You'll get what's coming to you. Rest assured'.

39.speaker: Lae'zel
39.context: NodeContext: 'You'll get what's coming to you. Rest assured'.

124.speaker: Lae'zel
124.text: The artefact is closed to me. But its protection is an advantage - as is having a skilful cleric at my side.

221.speaker: Lae'zel
221.text: But I will attend to the Prism's occupant, in time. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

169.speaker: Lae'zel
169.text: But make no mistake - I will slay the Prism's occupant, as Vlaakith's commanded. Perhaps your mission can still be fulfilled... but it will not come at the cost of mine.

198.speaker: Lae'zel
198.text: Purification is my mission - not your contraband. I am content for the time being.
198.context: NodeContext: 'You'll get what's coming to you. Rest assured'.

23.speaker: Lae'zel
23.text: But beware. My kin undoubtedly hunt you. If caught, your death will be slow, exquisite.
23.context: NodeContext: 'You'll get what's coming to you. Rest assured'.

112.speaker: Lae'zel
112.text: Rest. Dawn breaks all too soon.
112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel departs for her bedroll.

259.speaker: Shadowheart
259.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart rushes Laezel, weapon ready.NodeContext: Lae'zel prepares to fight.

215.speaker: Shadowheart
215.text: Ha! Very well, let us make this interesting.
215.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart rushes Laezel, weapon ready.NodeContext: Lae'zel prepares to fight.

264.speaker: Lae'zel
264.text: Ha! Very well, let us make this interesting.
264.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart rushes Laezel, weapon ready.NodeContext: Lae'zel prepares to fight.

123.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel rushes Shadowheart, stabbing her below the ribcage, Shadowheat falls to the ground. Leaving her to bleed out (1HP), Lae'zel takes the artefact and moves to leave. As she does so...

The artefact appears to vibrate in her hands. Lae'zel has just enough time to cock her head and look at the item quizically before a blast of pisonic energy overcomes her. In a wider angle, the psionic explosion engulfs her. Shadowheart, still on the ground, is splattered with Lae'zel's blood.

201.speaker: Shadowheart
201.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel rushes Shadowheart, stabbing her below the ribcage, Shadowheat falls to the ground. Leaving her to bleed out (1HP), Lae'zel takes the artefact and moves to leave. As she does so...

The artefact appears to vibrate in her hands. Lae'zel has just enough time to cock her head and look at the item quizically before a blast of pisonic energy overcomes her. In a wider angle, the psionic explosion engulfs her. Shadowheart, still on the ground, is splattered with Lae'zel's blood.

233.speaker: Shadowheart
233.text: Offer her a half-truth. Say you found it on a dead gith.

227.speaker: Lae'zel
227.text: Perhaps this is so. Show me the heirloom.

156.speaker: Lae'zel
156.text: Perhaps this is so. Show me the heirloom.

12.text: I am certain you did. And now I shall find it in turn, on a dead half-elf.

179.speaker: Lae'zel
179.text: I am certain you did. And now I shall find it in turn, on a dead half-elf.

84.speaker: Shadowheart
84.text: Do your worst. I won't tell you anything.

218.speaker: Lae'zel
218.text: My worst is for worthy foes. This will have to suffice.

258.speaker: Shadowheart
258.text: I still could. Then no more Lae'zel to pry into my affairs...
258.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

240.speaker: Lae'zel
240.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

14.speaker: Shadowheart
14.text: Good. This little venture would be duller without you, I'll admit.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: My Creed forbids such weakness. Explain yourself - and then try to kill me.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

4.speaker: Shadowheart
4.text: Persistent, aren't you? Under different circumstances, I'm sure we'd get on quite well.
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

64.speaker: Shadowheart
64.text: Persistent, aren't you? Under different circumstances, I'm sure we'd get on quite well.
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

177.speaker: Shadowheart
177.text: There. Is that worth your life?
177.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reveals box, still holding Lae'zel at knifepoiint.NodeContext: Shadowheart holds up the box (approx rubik's cube size) with her free hand while keeping her blade out.

100.speaker: Lae'zel
100.text: I don't care about the relic, only the occupant inside it. Keep it with you.
100.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

190.speaker: Lae'zel
190.text: The relic is gith, but means nothing to me. You can do with it as you like.
190.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

263.speaker: Shadowheart
263.text: Hmm. You seem sincere, oddly enough. Let's say we have an understanding.
263.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

219.speaker: Shadowheart
219.text: But if you break your promise, I'll kill you. Sleep well.
219.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: But if that comes into doubt, I'll kill you. Sleep well.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: LZ and SH put their weapons away and SH leaves.

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: The gith you took this from will hunt you down and kill you. Slowly.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel charges Shadowheat, knife out.

206.speaker: Shadowheart
206.text: They are more than welcome to try.

267.speaker: Lae'zel
267.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel charges Shadowheat, knife out.

189.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel charges Shadowheat, knife out.

97.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel charges Shadowheat, knife out.

252.speaker: Lae'zel
252.text: You talk a great deal for a would-be murderer. Get on with it, if you dare try.

210.speaker: Lae'zel
210.text: That heirloom is as much my affair as it is yours.

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: I'll kill you if necessary. But explaining your corpse would be a chore.

229.speaker: Shadowheart
229.text: If I knew you weren't a threat to me - to my mission - then perhaps we could make peace.

55.speaker: Shadowheart
55.text: So. Can you let the matter drop, or should I put you back to sleep permanently?

151.speaker: Shadowheart
151.text: You've been misinformed. By who, I wonder?

180.speaker: Lae'zel
180.text: And yet here I stand. Concerned.

90.speaker: Shadowheart
90.text: It's nothing. A lucky keepsake I found in some ruins.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: A keepsake. Very well. Perhaps I was misinformed.

160.speaker: Lae'zel
160.text: A keepsake. Very well. Perhaps I was misinformed.

192.speaker: Lae'zel
192.text: We shall see. Now let us rest.

37.text: Your lies are not as cunning as you think, istik. Show me this 'keepsake'.

109.speaker: Lae'zel
109.text: Your lies are not as cunning as you think, istik. Show me this 'keepsake'.

36.speaker: Lae'zel
36.text: I know the gith heirloom you possess must be important to my kin. As I know they would not yield it willingly to you.
